info.description: This is the API documentation for Lokajatim.
info.title: Lokajatim API

get.description: Get a list of all events
Get details of an event by ID

post.description: This endpoint sends an OTP to the provided email address
post.summary: Send OTP to the user's email

get.summary: Get all likes for an article
Check if a user liked an article

post.description: This endpoint resets the password after validating the OTP
